2004.name: Unknown
2004.message:
Unable to connect to the server.
Please try again later.

For help, visit support.nintendo.com
2004.short_description: Console failed to connect to the server
2004.long_description: This error indicates a connection problem with the server.
2004.short_solution: Check server status and try again later
2004.long_solution:
- **Check our network status information**
> Check our [Network Status page](https://stats.uptimerobot.com/R7E4wiGjJq) and ensure that there are no ongoing service outages.

- **Ensure your console can connect to the internet and try again**
> Try performing a connection test in system settings. If the connection test fails, there is likely another issues on your network
